ds_id: Macaulay Culkin's meta moment uses Ryan Gosling for extra cheese@TODAY@2014-05-12 00:00:00.000000@Meta
data_content: Actor Macaulay Culkin, lead singer of New York-based band The Pizza Underground, has been spotted wearing a T-shirt with a picture of Ryan Gosling wearing a Macaulay Culkin T-shirt. The band covers Velvet Underground songs with a pizza twist, and the picture of Culkin was shared on the band's Twitter account. Gosling was previously been spotted wearing the Culkin T-shirt around a year ago, and the two actors were born within a few months of each other in 1980.
